alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:20PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Norton and northwestern Graham Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Lenora, or 12 miles northwest of Hill City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lenora around 340 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Edmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
